name: Targeting Entries
flavor: The way is the target(ing entry)
text:
- Moves targeting **One Ally**: Can also be used against consenting Foes.
- Moves targeting **Foe**: Can also be used against allies, but not against yourself.
- Moves targeting **All Allies**: Do not affect yourself
- Moves targeting **All Foes**: Declare the order in which your character focuses on enemies. For each successive target, reduce the damage die count by 1.
- Moves targeting **Area**: Select one opponent as your primary target.; these moves target everyone except the user. Only roll damage once against all targets, but deal half damage (rounded up) against your allies.
- Only the first target on multi-target moves can receive a critical hit.
